description:
Development Environment, Tooling Platform and Application Framework.

Apache NetBeans is much more than a text editor. It highlights source code syntactically and semantically, lets you easily refactor code, with a range of handy and powerful tools.
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Friends-of-Apache-NetBeans/netbeans-installers/compare/v28...v27
This is a transitional release.
The release process is a transition from signing by Codelerity to signing by Friends of Apache NetBeans.
Linux
The Linux releases can be use as is.
Windoiws
The Windows (x64) version is signed with a self signed certificate. The certificate, in two formats is available on the main page of this repository.
macOS
Not yet available
